net.milkbowl.vault2.economy

Interface Economy


  • public interface Economy
    The main economy API

      Retrieves a list of account IDs that the specified account has the specified permissions for.

      Retrieves a list of account IDs owned by the specified account ID.

      Gets balance of a UUID on the specified world.
      boolean createAccount(@NotNull UUID accountID, @NotNull String name)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is deprecated as of version 2.8, and has been replaced by createAccount(UUID, String, String, boolean). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.
      boolean createAccount(@NotNull UUID accountID, @NotNull String name, boolean player)
      Creates a new account with the provided information.
      boolean createAccount(@NotNull UUID accountID, @NotNull String name, @NotNull String worldName)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is deprecated as of version 2.8, and has been replaced by createAccount(UUID, String, String, boolean). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.
      boolean createAccount(@NotNull UUID accountID, @NotNull String name, @NotNull String worldName, boolean player)
      Creates a new account with the given parameters.
      boolean createSharedAccount(@NotNull String pluginName, @NotNull UUID accountID, @NotNull String name, @NotNull UUID owner)
      Creates a shared account with the specified parameters.
      @NotNull Collection<String> currencies()
      Returns a list of currencies used by the economy plugin.

      Returns the name of the default currency in plural form.

      Deletes the account associated with the specified UUID.
      @NotNull EconomyResponse deposit(@NotNull String pluginName, @NotNull UUID accountID, @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
      Deposit an amount to an account associated with the given UUID - DO NOT USE NEGATIVE AMOUNTS.
      @NotNull EconomyResponse deposit(@NotNull String pluginName, @NotNull UUID accountID, @NotNull String worldName, @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
      Deposit an amount to an account associated with a UUID on a given world - DO NOT USE NEGATIVE AMOUNTS IMPLEMENTATION SPECIFIC - if an economy plugin does not support this the global balance will be returned.
      @NotNull EconomyResponse deposit(@NotNull String pluginName, @NotNull UUID accountID, @NotNull String worldName, @NotNull String currency, @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
      Deposit an amount to an account associated with a UUID on a given world - DO NOT USE NEGATIVE AMOUNTS IMPLEMENTATION SPECIFIC - if an economy plugin does not support this the global balance will be returned.
      @NotNull String format(@NotNull BigDecimal amount)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is deprecated as of version 2.8, and has been replaced by format(String, BigDecimal). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.
      @NotNull String format(@NotNull BigDecimal amount, @NotNull String currency)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is deprecated as of version 2.8, and has been replaced by format(String, BigDecimal, String). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.

      Plugins use this method to format a given BigDecimal amount into a human-readable amount using your economy plugin's currency names/conventions.

      Deprecated. 
      This method is deprecated as of version 2.9, and has been replaced by balance(String, UUID, String). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.

      Deprecated. 
      This method is deprecated as of version 2.9, and has been replaced by balance(String, UUID, String, String). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.

      Withdraw an amount from an account associated with a UUID on a given world - DO NOT USE NEGATIVE AMOUNTS IMPLEMENTATION SPECIFIC - if an economy plugin does not support this the global balance will be returned.

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Checks if economy plugin is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the server's economy plugin has properly enabled.

      • getName

        @NotNull
@NotNull String getName()
        Gets name of the economy plugin.
        Returns:
        Name of the active economy plugin on the server.

        Returns true if the economy plugin supports shared accounts.
        Returns:
        true if the economy plugin supports shared accounts.

      • hasMultiCurrencySupport

        boolean hasMultiCurrencySupport()
        Returns true if the economy plugin supports multiple currencies.
        Returns:
        true if the economy plugin supports multiple currencies.

      • fractionalDigits

        int fractionalDigits(@NotNull
                     @NotNull String pluginName)
        Some economy plugins round off after a certain number of digits. This function returns the number of digits the plugin keeps or -1 if no rounding occurs.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        Returns:
        number of digits after the decimal point this plugin supports or -1 if no rounding occurs.

      • format

        @NotNull
 @Deprecated
@NotNull String format(@NotNull
                                             @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
        Deprecated. This method is deprecated as of version 2.8, and has been replaced by format(String, BigDecimal). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.
        Plugins use this method to format a given BigDecimal amount into a human-readable amount using your economy plugin's currency names/conventions.
        Parameters:
        amount - to format.
        Returns:
        Human-readable string describing amount, ie 5 Dollars or 5.55 Pounds.

      • format

        @NotNull
@NotNull String format(@NotNull
                                @NotNull String pluginName,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
        Plugins use this method to format a given BigDecimal amount into a human-readable amount using your economy plugin's currency names/conventions.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        amount - to format.
        Returns:
        Human-readable String describing amount, ie 5 Dollars or 5.55 Pounds.

      • format

        @NotNull
 @Deprecated
@NotNull String format(@NotNull
                                             @NotNull BigDecimal amount,
                                             @NotNull
                                             @NotNull String currency)
        Deprecated. This method is deprecated as of version 2.8, and has been replaced by format(String, BigDecimal, String). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.
        Plugins use this method to format a given BigDecimal amount into a human-readable amount using your economy plugin's currency names/conventions.
        Parameters:
        amount - to format.
        currency - the currency to use for the format.
        Returns:
        Human-readable string describing amount, ie 5 Dollars or 5.55 Pounds.

      • format

        @NotNull
@NotNull String format(@NotNull
                                @NotNull String pluginName,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull BigDecimal amount,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull String currency)
        Plugins use this method to format a given BigDecimal amount into a human-readable amount using your economy plugin's currency names/conventions.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        amount - to format.
        currency - the currency to use for the format.
        Returns:
        Human-readable String describing amount, ie 5 Dollars or 5.55 Pounds.

      • hasCurrency

        boolean hasCurrency(@NotNull
                    @NotNull String currency)
        Returns true if a currency with the specified name exists.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getDefaultCurrency

        @NotNull
@NotNull String getDefaultCurrency(@NotNull
                                            @NotNull String pluginName)
        Used to get the default currency. This could be the default currency for the server globally or for the default world if the implementation supports multi-world.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        Returns:
        The currency that is the default for the server if multi-world support is not available otherwise the default for the default world.

      • defaultCurrencyNamePlural

        @NotNull
@NotNull String defaultCurrencyNamePlural(@NotNull
                                                   @NotNull String pluginName)
        Returns the name of the default currency in plural form. If the economy being used does not support currency names then an empty string will be returned.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        Returns:
        name of the currency (plural) ie: Dollars or Pounds.

      • defaultCurrencyNameSingular

        @NotNull
@NotNull String defaultCurrencyNameSingular(@NotNull
                                                     @NotNull String pluginName)
        Returns the name of the default currency in singular form. If the economy being used does not support currency names then an empty string will be returned.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        Returns:
        name of the currency (singular) ie: Dollar or Pound.

      • currencies

        @NotNull
@NotNull Collection<String> currencies()
        Returns a list of currencies used by the economy plugin. These are able to be used in the calls in the methods of the API. May not be human-readable.
        Returns:
        list of currencies used by the economy plugin. These are able to be used in the calls in the methods of the API.

      • createAccount

        @Deprecated
boolean createAccount(@NotNull
                                  @NotNull UUID accountID,
                                  @NotNull
                                  @NotNull String name)
        Deprecated. This method is deprecated as of version 2.8, and has been replaced by createAccount(UUID, String, String, boolean). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.
        Attempts to create an account for the given UUID.
        Parameters:
        accountID - UUID associated with the account.
        name - UUID associated with the account.
        Returns:
        true if the account creation was successful.

      • createAccount

        boolean createAccount(@NotNull
                      @NotNull UUID accountID,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull String name,
                      boolean player)
        Creates a new account with the provided information.
        Parameters:
        accountID - The UUID of the account to be created.
        name - The name associated with the account.
        player - A flag indicating if the account is a player account.
        Returns:
        true if the account was successfully created, false otherwise.

      • createAccount

        @Deprecated
boolean createAccount(@NotNull
                                  @NotNull UUID accountID,
                                  @NotNull
                                  @NotNull String name,
                                  @NotNull
                                  @NotNull String worldName)
        Deprecated. This method is deprecated as of version 2.8, and has been replaced by createAccount(UUID, String, String, boolean). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.
        Attempts to create an account for the given UUID on the specified world IMPLEMENTATION SPECIFIC - if an economy plugin does not support this then false will always be returned.
        Parameters:
        accountID - UUID associated with the account.
        name - UUID associated with the account.
        worldName - String name of the world.
        Returns:
        if the account creation was successful

      • createAccount

        boolean createAccount(@NotNull
                      @NotNull UUID accountID,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull String name,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull String worldName,
                      boolean player)
        Creates a new account with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        accountID - The UUID of the account to be created.
        name - The name of the account holder.
        worldName - The world name associated with the account.
        player - A boolean indicating if the account belongs to a player.
        Returns:
        True if the account was successfully created, false otherwise.

      • getUUIDNameMap

        @NotNull
@NotNull Map<UUID,String> getUUIDNameMap()
        Returns a map that represents all the UUIDs which have accounts in the plugin, as well as their last-known-name. This is used for Vault's economy converter and should be given every account available.
        Returns:
        a Map composed of the accounts keyed by their UUID, along with their associated last-known-name.

      • getAccountName

        Optional<String> getAccountName(@NotNull
                                @NotNull UUID accountID)
        Gets the last known name of an account owned by the given UUID. Required for messages to be more human-readable than UUIDs alone can provide.
        Parameters:
        accountID - UUID associated with the account.
        Returns:
        An optional containing the last known name if the account exists, otherwise an empty optional.

                   @NotNull UUID accountID)
        Checks if this UUID has an account yet.
        Parameters:
        accountID - UUID to check for an existing account.
        Returns:
        true if the UUID has an account.

                   @NotNull UUID accountID,
                   @NotNull
                   @NotNull String worldName)
        Checks if this UUID has an account yet on the given world.
        Parameters:
        accountID - UUID to check for an existing account.
        worldName - world-specific account.
        Returns:
        if the UUID has an account.

      • renameAccount

        boolean renameAccount(@NotNull
                      @NotNull UUID accountID,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull String name)
        A method which changes the name associated with the given UUID in the value returned from getUUIDNameMap().
        Parameters:
        accountID - UUID whose account is having a name change.
        name - String name that will be associated with the UUID in the map.
        Returns:
        true if the name change is successful.

      • renameAccount

                      @NotNull String plugin,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull UUID accountID,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull String name)
        Renames the account with the specified ID in the given plugin to the new name.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin name where the account exists
        accountID - The unique identifier of the account to be renamed
        name - The new name to assign to the account
        Returns:
        true if the rename operation was successful, false otherwise

      • accountSupportsCurrency

        boolean accountSupportsCurrency(@NotNull
                                @NotNull String plugin,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull UUID accountID,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull String currency)
        Determines whether an account supports a specific currency.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the name of the plugin
        accountID - the UUID of the account
        currency - the currency to check support for
        Returns:
        true if the account supports the currency, false otherwise

      • accountSupportsCurrency

        boolean accountSupportsCurrency(@NotNull
                                @NotNull String plugin,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull UUID accountID,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull String currency,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull String world)
        Checks if the given account supports the specified currency in the given world.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the name of the plugin requesting the check
        accountID - the UUID of the player account
        currency - the currency code to check support for
        world - the name of the world to check in
        Returns:
        true if the account supports the currency in the world, false otherwise

      • getBalance

        @NotNull
 @Deprecated
@NotNull BigDecimal getBalance(@NotNull
                                                     @NotNull String pluginName,
                                                     @NotNull
                                                     @NotNull UUID accountID)
        Deprecated. This method is deprecated as of version 2.9, and has been replaced by balance(String, UUID). This allows economy plugins to know exactly if the account is a player or not. This may be removed in a future release.
        Gets balance of an account associated with a UUID.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        accountID - UUID of the account to get a balance for.
        Returns:

 @Deprecated

                                                     @NotNull String world)

        Gets balance of a UUID on the specified world. IMPLEMENTATION SPECIFIC - if an economy plugin does not support this the global balance will be returned.

        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        accountID - UUID of the account to get a balance for.
        world - name of the world.

        Amount currently held in account associated with the given UUID.

      • has

        boolean has(@NotNull
            @NotNull String pluginName,
            @NotNull
            @NotNull UUID accountID,
            @NotNull
            @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
        Checks if the account associated with the given UUID has the amount - DO NOT USE NEGATIVE AMOUNTS.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        accountID - the UUID associated with the account to check the balance of.
        amount - the amount to check for.
        Returns:
        True if UUID has amount, False else wise.

      • has

        boolean has(@NotNull
            @NotNull String pluginName,
            @NotNull
            @NotNull UUID accountID,
            @NotNull
            @NotNull String worldName,
            @NotNull
            @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
        Checks if the account associated with the given UUID has the amount in the given world - DO NOT USE NEGATIVE AMOUNTS IMPLEMENTATION SPECIFIC - if an economy plugin does not support this the global balance will be returned.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        accountID - the UUID associated with the account to check the balance of.
        worldName - the name of the world to check in.
        amount - the amount to check for.
        Returns:
        True if UUID has amount in the given world, False else wise.

            @NotNull UUID accountID,

            @NotNull String currency,

        accountID - the UUID associated with the account to check the balance of.
        worldName - the name of the world to check in.
        currency - the currency to use.
        amount - the amount to check for.
        Returns:
        True if UUID has amount in the given world, False else wise.

      • set

        default EconomyResponse set(@NotNull
                            @NotNull String pluginName,
                            @NotNull
                            @NotNull UUID accountID,
                            @NotNull
                            @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
        Sets the amount of monies for a player.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - the name of the plugin setting the currency
        accountID - the unique identifier of the player's account
        amount - the amount of currency to set for the player in the specified world
        Returns:
        an EconomyResponse object indicating the result of the operation

      • withdraw

        @NotNull
@NotNull EconomyResponse withdraw(@NotNull
                                           @NotNull String pluginName,
                                           @NotNull
                                           @NotNull UUID accountID,
                                           @NotNull
                                           @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
        Withdraw an amount from an account associated with a UUID - DO NOT USE NEGATIVE AMOUNTS.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        accountID - the UUID associated with the account to withdraw from.
        amount - Amount to withdraw.
        Returns:
        EconomyResponse which includes the Economy plugin's EconomyResponse.ResponseType as to whether the transaction was a Success, Failure, Unsupported.

      • withdraw

        @NotNull
@NotNull EconomyResponse withdraw(@NotNull
                                           @NotNull String pluginName,
                                           @NotNull
                                           @NotNull UUID accountID,
                                           @NotNull
                                           @NotNull String worldName,
                                           @NotNull
                                           @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
        Withdraw an amount from an account associated with a UUID on a given world - DO NOT USE NEGATIVE AMOUNTS IMPLEMENTATION SPECIFIC - if an economy plugin does not support this the global balance will be returned.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that is calling the method.
        accountID - the UUID associated with the account to withdraw from.
        worldName - the name of the world to check in.
        amount - Amount to withdraw.
        Returns:
        EconomyResponse which includes the Economy plugin's EconomyResponse.ResponseType as to whether the transaction was a Success, Failure, Unsupported.

      • addAccountMember

        boolean addAccountMember(@NotNull
                         @NotNull String pluginName,
                         @NotNull
                         @NotNull UUID accountID,
                         @NotNull
                         @NotNull UUID uuid,
                         @NotNull
                         AccountPermission... initialPermissions)
        Adds a member to an account with the specified initial permissions.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin.
        accountID - The UUID of the account.
        uuid - The UUID of the member to be added.
        initialPermissions - The initial permissions to be assigned to the member. The values for these should be assumed to be "true."
        Returns:
        true if the member was added successfully, false otherwise.

      • updateAccountPermission

        boolean updateAccountPermission(@NotNull
                                @NotNull String pluginName,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull UUID accountID,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull UUID uuid,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull AccountPermission permission,
                                boolean value)
        Updates the account permission for a specific plugin and user.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - the name of the plugin
        accountID - the UUID of the account
        uuid - the UUID to update the permission for
        permission - the new account permissions to set
        value - the new permission value to set for this value
        Returns:
        true if the account permission was successfully updated, false otherwise
